<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1528) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
An ally within your melee reach is hit by an attack, you can see the attacker, and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC would turn the critical hit into a hit or the hit into a miss.

**Requirements**
You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.

</column>

---

You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack. This turns the triggering critical hit into a hit, or the triggering hit into a miss.
name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
requirement: You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding a single one-handed melee weapon and have your other hand or hands free.
